night_horizons.exceptions module¶

Module for exceptions in the night_horizons package.

exception night_horizons.exceptions.DstDarkFrameError¶

Bases: ValueError

An error that occurs when the destination image is too dark.

exception night_horizons.exceptions.HomographyTransformError¶

Bases: ValueError

An error in the homography transformatin process, typically when the homography matrix’s determinant has a very large or very small value.

exception night_horizons.exceptions.OutOfBoundsError¶

Bases: ValueError

An error that occurs when a calculation is attempted that is out of bounds (typically of the mosaic).

exception night_horizons.exceptions.SrcDarkFrameError¶

Bases: ValueError

An error that occurs when the source image is too dark.

night-horizons-mapmaker
